#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i,k,j,x,t,n,a,b,c;
    cin>>t;
    for(x=1;x<=t;x++)
    {
     cin>>n>>a>>b>>c;
     int num,num1,ans,ans1,ans2,count;
     num1=1;
     count=0;
     while(num1<=9)
     {
     num=(num1*10000)+(a*1000)+(b*100)+(c*10);
     j=0;
     for(i=num;i<=num+9;i++)
     {
       if(i%n==0) ans=i/n,ans1=num1,ans2=j,count=999;
       j++;
      } num1++; }
      if(count==999)
       cout<<ans1<<" "<<ans2<<" "<<ans<<endl;
       else cout<<"0"<<endl;
}    
}
